Columns.Description: Date and time the record was created.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: For Usage record SourceSystem is always OMS.
Columns.Name: SourceSystem

Columns.Description: Start time of the 1 hour aggregation window (same as TimeGenerated).
Columns.Name: StartTime

Columns.Description: End time of the one hour aggregation window.
Columns.Name: EndTime

Columns.Description: The URI of the workspace. This will be same for all records in this table in workspace.
Columns.Name: ResourceUri

Columns.Description: Table that usage is being reported about.
Columns.Name: DataType

Columns.Description: Solution about which usage is being reported.
Columns.Name: Solution

Columns.Description: Logical flag to indicate whether we bill for this data record.
Columns.Name: IsBillable

Columns.Description: GUID of the meter used for billing.
Columns.Name: MeterId
